content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #79902 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
@WG-prioritization also this one needs an evaluation. I can't get enough context on this one.
Curiously I've tried running on godbolt the snippet in this comment but i can't reproduce the ICE on any Rust version.
@apiraino I think the MCVE is not an ICE, just showing that the compiler is doing something wrong
the ICE is while compiling a large crate: https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.49-1/beta-2020-11-26/gh/folex.libp2p-multilang/log.txt
ah ok I thought the snippet was _meant_ to reproduce the crash. So we need an actual mcve for this?
